Public Remarks: Welcome to Hillside located on Vancouvers prestigious South West Marine Drive. Situated on 64,500 square feet of beautifully landscaped grounds, this gorgeous Cape Cod colonial-style home was custom built for the Buckerfield family in 1926. Rich with history and tradition, the Hillside residence features over 8,000 square feet of family living with 6 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms, and multiple great rooms, making the home an entertainers paradise. Stunning southern views of the Islands, golf course and river are available from all levels. Surrounded by manicured gardens that lead down to the golf course, Hillside is secluded and private, with a gated entry off SW Marine Dr. Local schools are McKechnie and Magee Secondary School. Close to YVR, UBC, York House, St. Georges & Crofton Schools.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements approximate. To be verified by Buyer if important. Showings by appt with 24 hrs notice. Do not enter property.
